description: Detects the execution of the LocalPotato POC based on basic PE metadata information and default CLI examples
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: HackTool - LocalPotato Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\LocalPotato.exe") OR ((process.command_line.text:"*.exe\ \-i\ C\:\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\-o\ Windows\\*")) OR (winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*IMPHASH\=E1742EE971D6549E8D4D81115F88F1FC* OR *IMPHASH\=DD82066EFBA94D7556EF582F247C8BB5*)) OR (winlog.event_data.Imphash:("E1742EE971D6549E8D4D81115F88F1FC" OR "DD82066EFBA94D7556EF582F247C8BB5")))
